# Images for digital signature

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
seq(from = -10, to = 10, by = 0.05) %>%
  expand.grid(x = ., y = .) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = (x + pi*sin(y)), y = (y + pi*sin(x)))) +
  geom_point(alpha = .1, shape = 20, size = 1, color = "black") +
  theme_void()
```
